text: Shehra assembly constituency () is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Panchmahal district. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments:This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Shehra Taluka # Lunawada Taluka (Part) Villages – Kel, Dezar, Vaghoi, Chuladiya, Jetharibor, Gugaliya, Simlet # Godhra Taluka (Part) Villages – Nadisar, Khajuri, Odidra, Jaliya, Dhanitra, Rinchhrota, Motal, Karsana, Velvad, Ichhapaginu Muvadu, Ratanpur (Kantdi), Kabirpur, Kabariya, Juni Dhari, Timba, Gotavipura, Pipaliya (Dhari), Moryo, Kankanpur, Moti Kantdi, Gothada ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 250 || 113111 || 103888 || 1 || 217000 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *2007 - Jethabhai Bharwad, Bharatiya Janata Party *2012 - Jethabhai Bharwad, Bharatiya Janata Party ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==See also== * List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly * Gujarat Legislative Assembly ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Panchmahal district
title: Shehra
